entries.content: LATEST UPDATE READ ALL ABOUT IT.

Someone broke the shower AGAIN. I'm convinced it's cursed at this point. Clemensia claims she saw a plasma fruit floating through the walls, but we all know she's just trying to stir up more drama. Living (and unliving?) with vampires is exhausting but at least it's never boring! ðŸ¦‡ðŸ’•

The drama is UNREAL today. Hortensia decided she's had ENOUGH of everyone's nonsense and locked herself in the bathroom for 4 hours. Meanwhile, Thaddeus tried to cook a grilled cheese and somehow set the kitchen on fire??? The ghosts are absolutely living for this chaos (pun intended). Vlad would be so disappointed. Or maybe proud? It's hard to tell with him tbh. ðŸ’€âœ¨
